description:
You are given a string array words, and an array groups, both arrays having length n. The hamming distance between two strings of equal length is the number of positions at which the corresponding characters are different. You need to select the longest
subsequence
 from an array of indices [0, 1, ..., n - 1], such that for the subsequence denoted as [i0, i1, ..., ik-1] having length k, the following holds: Return a string array containing the words corresponding to the indices (in order) in the selected subsequence. If there are multiple answers, return any of them. Note: strings in words may be unequal in length.
